recommended_degree: Elektronika Industri, Teknik  Industri, Teknik Alat Berat, Teknik Elektronika (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
- Assist the Maintenance team in routine inspections and preventive maintenance activities for workshop equipment and facilities.
- Support document maintenance logs, checklists, and repair reports.
- Support basic troubleshooting and follow-up actions under supervisor guidance.
- Coordinate with technicians for equipment readiness, tools allocation, and maintenance scheduling.
- Perform additional maintenance-related tasks assigned by the Maintenance Supervisor.
